title: Noam Chomsky - Neoliberalism and Inflation
description:
This is an excerpt from an interview we conducted with Prof. Noam Chomsky on June 14, 2022. For the full interview visit: https://www.actvism.org/en/politics/noam-chomsky-ukraine-russa-nato-assange/

Watch also our recent interview with Chris Hedges here:
https://youtu.be/V_1Ok10bUDI
